page.title: 13Farming
page.content: {TRACTORS.}Most modern tractors are four wheel drive.Ford Renault and Massey Ferguson are two wheel drive. You can get four wheel drive.Mr.Lennox has got 9 Fords and 3 Renaults and 1 Massey Ferguson. {A combine}is a machine that cuts the corn and seperates the corn from the stems.It throws out the stems,and stores the corn in a tank . A bailer is a machine which picks up hay or straw and makes it into blocks which are then stored. {The Mower}cuts the grass. Then you wait for the sun to make it go brown and then it is bailed. People do silaging as well now. They cut the grass and then pick it up with a machine which dumps it into a great big trailer. The cut grass is stored under black polythene to ferment.
